description: This file defines the page component for watching a video, including fetching video data and related videos, and rendering the video player, comments, and related videos sections.

methods.name: WatchInner
methods.description: Main component managing video data fetch and display, including handling loading states, errors, and rendering video player and related components.

methods.name: WatchPage
methods.description: Top-level component that wraps WatchInner with Suspense fallback for the page.
